message: Great choice! S-Corps in the Operations zone help you optimize employment taxes while maintaining business flexibility. Consider maximizing your reasonable salary strategy here.
Smart move! LLCs in the Assets zone provide excellent liability protection for your investments. This structure helps separate your active business from passive income streams.
Excellent foundation! The trust structure at the base provides estate planning benefits and potential tax advantages. Consider how this owns and controls your other entities.
Welcome to entity creation! Consider the tax implications of each entity type. S-Corps are great for active businesses, LLCs for passive investments, and trusts for estate planning.
Connecting entities creates ownership flows that can optimize your tax structure. Make sure you understand how income and losses flow through each connection.
The 1040 Flow zone shows how all your entity income and deductions ultimately flow to your personal tax return. This is where the magic of tax optimization happens!
